front.title: Message Header Field for Indicating Message Authentication Status

abstract.t: This document specifies a message header field called Authentication- Results for use with electronic mail messages to indicate the results of message authentication efforts. Any receiver-side software, such as mail filters or Mail User Agents (MUAs), can use this header field to relay that information in a convenient and meaningful way to users, or make sorting and filtering decisions. This document is a candidate for Internet Standard status. [RFC Editor: Please delete this notation, as I imagine it will be indicated some other way.]
